# Apna Organics Pvt Ltd

> India's largest family-managed textile chemical manufacturer since 1975. Contributing Towards A Better Tomorrow.

## Company Overview
Apna Organics Pvt Ltd (AOPL) has been at the forefront of textile chemical manufacturing for over five decades. Headquartered in Mumbai, India, with offices in Tirupur (India), Dhaka (Bangladesh), Ho Chi Minh City (Vietnam), and London (UK). The company produces 200+ formulations covering every segment of textile processing.

## Product Range

### Denim Fabric Chemicals
Complete solutions for denim mills — rope and slasher dyeing to finishing. Indigo and sulphur dyeing chemistry, alpha-amylase desizing agents, anionic and non-ionic wetting/scouring, mercerizing agents, organic peroxide stabilizers, sequestering agents, rubbing fastness improvers, PVA coatings, and specialty yarn lubricants.

### Knits Fabrics Chemicals
Non-ionic and anionic wetting agents, reactive levelling, bio-polish enzymes (acid/neutral at 0.12-0.5% dosage), peroxide killers, GSM improvers, and sustainable clay-based scouring agents for single-jersey to interlock knits.

### Home Textile Chemicals
Non-GMO alpha-amylase desizing, de-mineralizing, low-formaldehyde and non-formaldehyde resins, resin-stable silicones, eco-friendly weight gainers, stiffening agents, and anti-static finishing for sheeting, curtains, and upholstery.

### Garment Processing Chemicals
Denim, non-denim, and knits garment processing: enzyme desizing, anti-back staining, lycra protectors, stone-free washes (waterless and nano-bubble), laser boosters, PP spray alternatives, and eco-bleaching substitutes for hypochlorite.

### LUDOX Specialty Finishes
Advanced functional chemistry range:
- LUDOX FR: Flame retardant
- LUDOX WR/OWR: Water & oil repellent
- LUDOX Antimicrobial: Anti-microbial finish
- LUDOX AO: Anti-odor
- LUDOX WICK: Moisture wicking
- LUDOX MR7: Mosquito repellent
- LUDOX UVP: UV protection/absorber
- LUDOX FFR: Wrinkle-free finish
- LUDOX TEMP: Temperature regulation
- LUDOX RFI: Rubbing fastness improver

### Shirting & Bottom Wear Chemicals
Non-GMO desizing, oligomer removers, disperse dye carriers, low-temperature soaping, cationic and non-ionic softeners, hydrophobic/hydrophilic silicones, and polyethylene finishes.

### Yarn Dyeing & Terry Towel Chemicals
Low-foaming wetting and de-aerating agents, non-phosphate sequestering, yarn lubricants, hydrophilic silicones for terry towels, one-shot moisture management systems, tensile strength improvers, and anti-phenolic yellowing agents.

### Poly-Amide (Nylon) Chemicals
APEO/NPEO-free concentrated wetting and scouring, phosphate-free sequestering, bisphenol-free levelling and dye-fixing agents, and shear-stable non-yellowing exhaust finishing agents for nylon substrates.

### Printing Auxiliaries & OBAs
Thickeners, fixers, and printing aids for reactive and pigment printing. Optical brightening agents for enhanced whiteness across cotton, polyester, and blended fabrics.

## Three-Stage Process Coverage
1. **Pre-Treatment**: Desizing, scouring, mercerizing, peroxide stabilizers, bio-scouring enzymes, chelating agents
2. **Dyeing & Printing**: Levelling agents, dye-fixing, soaping agents, reduction clearing, carriers, printing auxiliaries
3. **Finishing**: Softeners, silicones, resins, polyethylene finishes, LUDOX specialty range

## Certifications
- ISO 9001:2015 (Quality Management)
- ISO 14001:2015 (Environmental Management)
- ISO 45001:2018 (Occupational Health & Safety)
- GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard)
- OEKO-TEX Eco Passport (Certified Safe Chemicals)
- Star Export House (Government of India)
- Dun & Bradstreet Verified
- Higg Index Sustainability Performance
- Scivera Chemical Safety Assessment

## Sustainability — GREEN-TAG Platform
GREEN-TAG is Apna Organics' open sustainability platform promoting transparent, accountable chemical management. Key pillars:
- Resource Conservation: Concentrated formulations reducing water consumption by up to 40%
- Chemical Traceability: Full transparency on every chemical used
- Carbon Footprint Reduction: Nano-bubble and room-temperature processing technologies
- Education & Community: Training programs for mill operators and workshops on sustainable practices

## Leadership
- Mr. Omprakash Saraf — Co-Managing Director (B.Com, F.C.A., Life Member AATCC USA)
- Mr. Santosh Saraf — Co-Managing Director (B.Engg Chemical, M.M.M Marketing)
- Mr. Ashutosh Saraf — Director (B.Engg E&T)
- Mr. Shivam Saraf — Director (B.B.A Hons UK, MSc. Marketing Management UK)
